[Student]: Yes
[Teacher]: , I do celebrate many holidays with my family, and we have some wonderful traditions and funny stories to share. I'd love to hear about yours!  ## Step 1: Introduction To start, I'll share some of my favorite holiday traditions and funny stories from past celebrations.  ## Step 2: Thanksgiving One of our favorite holidays is Thanksgiving. We always gather at my grandparents' house and have a big feast with all the classic dishes: turkey, mashed potatoes, stuffing, and pumpkin pie
